title: Pakistan men's national field hockey team
summary: The Pakistan national field hockey team (Urdu: پاکستان قومى ہاكى ٹیم‎)[4] represents Pakistan in international field hockey since its first match in 1948. It is administered by the Pakistan Hockey Federation (PHF), the governing body for hockey in Pakistan. They have been a member of the International Hockey Federation (FIH) since 1948 and founding member of the Asian Hockey Federation (ASHF) which formed in 1958.[5]
